HediffDef.label: standard mechadendrite
HediffDef.description: An installed standard mechadendrite. A unique plasteel-steel blend and advanced circuitry grant it exceptional agility and utility.

ThingDef.label: standard mechadendrite
ThingDef.description: Fabricated using precision manufacturing, a unique blend of plasteel and steel give ample protection and agility while keeping costs down. While internal circuitry and nerve-link gels grant direct control over the standard mechadendrite. All while mini-servos provide fine motor function. It is superior to any previous mechadendrite in every way.

HediffDef.label: standard engineer mechadendrite
HediffDef.description: An installed engineer mechadendrite. Improvements to fundamental designs compared to its precursor heighten its utility in mechanical engineering-related tasks.

ThingDef.label: standard engineer mechadendrite
ThingDef.description: Building upon the refined multitool mechadendrite, the standard engineer mechadendrite aids in many mechanical engineering tasks forsaking other tasks to streamline its design. With better tools and improvements in the fundamentals, it proves invaluable for engineers across the rim.

HediffDef.label: standard drill mechadendrite
HediffDef.description: A standard drill mechadendrite. With a drill at the tip of it and a tough plasteel exterior, it can make short of any mining job given to it.

ThingDef.label: standard drill mechadendrite
ThingDef.description: Created by putting a small drill on its tip, the drill can be controlled consciously by its user or used subconsciously to improve mining efforts. A tough plasteel exterior gives it much needed protection while performing mining operations with reinforced shielding within protects its delicate circuitry.

HediffDef.label: standard artisan mechadendrite
HediffDef.description: An installed standard artisan mechadendrite. Designed to aid with artisanry, its shape and form highlight this in both tool selection and general design.

ThingDef.label: standard artisan mechadendrite
ThingDef.description: Designed with the intent of assisting in artistic and unskilled labour, the standard artisan mechadendrite is elegantly designed with both shape and form highlighting its artisanal ancestry. Whatever the task may be, it is likely this mechadendrite can assist. One way or another.

HediffDef.label: standard vacuum mechadendrite
HediffDef.description: a standard vacuum mechadendrite. With an unorthodox design and vacuum cleaner on its end, it helps clean.

ThingDef.label: standard vacuum mechadendrite
ThingDef.description: A highly peculiar mechadendrite designed in an unorthodox manner. The standard vacuum mechadendrite acts like a vacuum cleaner able to suck up dust and other particulates while storing them in a chamber attached onto the mechadendrite chassis.
